messages.messageBody:

Beth

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] banging walls
messages.msgSnippet: ... Just to clarify, since my name was mentioned... We had a backyard *climbing* wall, not banging wall, though I m sure the kids banged on it, too. ;) I do
messages.messageBody:
camden wrote:

> Does anyone have any info on making your own banging wall? The best
> stuff
> to use & how to place it. I love music but I'm not "musical". Our kids
> would love it !
>
> Maybe even a picture of someone's backyard banging wall?
>
Just to clarify, since my name was mentioned...

We had a backyard *climbing* wall, not banging wall, though I'm sure the
kids banged on it, too. ;) I do have pictures of that some where, but
now that we've moved it will be in our basement where it's more climate
controlled.

--
~~Danielle
Emily (8), Julia (7), Sam (5)
http://www.danielleconger.com/Homeschool/Welcomehome.html

~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*

"With our thoughts, we make the world." ~~Buddha

messages.subject: banging walls

messages.messageBody:
Does anyone have any info on making your own banging wall? The best stuff
to use & how to place it. I love music but I'm not "musical". Our kids
would love it !

Maybe even a picture of someone's backyard banging wall?

Thanks
Carol
